author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In Texas Mall, a tumult dire,
Eight souls, to skies they 'send,
By clashing woe, as gunshot's fire,
Neutralized, the fiend at end.

White walls enshrine, the plates abide,
In dwellings sought with high demand,
Where rules of tint, they do decide,
Desire's breadth across the land.

By Churchill Downs, 'midst deaths of steed,
Mage's victory, on Derby's stage,
O'er Two Phil's flank, he took the lead,
With racing heart, he filled the page.

feedItems.title: Shooting at Texas Mall Leaves at Least Eight People Dead
feedItems.description: Seven others were injured in the rampage at the Allen Premium Outlets outside of Dallas. Authorities said the suspect was “neutralized.”

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: The houses must be white. There are even specific rules about the dinnerware. Everybody still wants in.

feedItems.title: Mage Wins the Kentucky Derby Amid String of Horse Deaths at Churchill Downs
feedItems.description: The 15-1 winner overtook Two Phil’s in the middle of the stretch in a year when the circumstances surrounding the race loomed over the biggest day in U.S. racing.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
A tycoon of age so grand and bold,
With ventures risky, tales oft told,
He doubles down, his fortune he dost mold,
The realm doth watch this merchant's story unfold.

At Berkshire's meet of annual fame,
Warren, the wise investor—his name,
He praiseth Apple, doth refrain from bid,
For Occidental, his purse stay hid.

Investors gather 'round the fire,
To money-market funds and CDs inquire,
Yield of five percent, or more they seek,
A strategy strong, before fear doth sneak.

feedItems.title: More »
feedItems.description: He's a 70-year-old tycoon with a taste for risky ventures some rivals wouldn't dare touch. And this time, he's doubling down.

feedItems.title: Warren Buffett Retains Sense of Optimism at Berkshire's Annual Meeting
feedItems.description: The legendary investor confirms he won’t bid for Occidental Petroleum and praises Apple.

feedItems.title: What Investors Should Know About Money-Market Funds and CDs
feedItems.description: Investors are turning to these cash-equivalent investments, some of which are yielding 5% or more. But it pays to have a strategy beyond fear.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Of silks and velvets, royals 'dorned, with grace array
On day of King Charles' glory, 'neath the lofty sway
From fair Princess of Wales, to Perry's song-light tone
And Jill Biden's tapestried garb, a beauteous throne

In solemn oaths and fanfare, a crown to lay
Upon our Carolean King, in pomp array
The trumpets echoed forth as history entwined
A dawning age of Britain's speckled hue, combined

Behold, a tender youth seeks wisdom’s sage in tune
The famed Buffett's voice they yearn, for insight soon
A chance to question mighty minds, in council meet
Their youthful hearts aflame, in learning's passion sweet

feedItems.title: Royal Fashion From King Charles's Big Day
feedItems.description: All the royal and celebrity style at the coronation of King Charles III, from the Princess of Wales to Katy Perry, Lionel Richie, Jill Biden and beyond.

feedItems.title: King Charles III Is Crowned in Lavish Coronation Ceremony
feedItems.description: The coronation marked the new Carolean era with a star-studded guest list, thousands of marching soldiers and a ceremony that celebrates a millennium of history and reflects a more modern, diverse Britain.

feedItems.title: Youngest Shareholders Vie for Chance to Quiz Warren Buffett
feedItems.description: At least one child is usually selected to ask the storied investor a question during the annual meeting.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In Moscow's realm, a clash of might,
Zakhar Prilepin, felled by light,
Ukraine they blame, the storm's cruel sleight,
As war's supporters face the night.

As Fenrir's jaws snap 'round the lands,
To safer shores, the Russian hands,
Lead frightened folk from Ukraine's strands,
Before Kyiv's force again expands.

In ancient halls of scholars deep,
The learned men of prison keep,
With Harvard's sons, a battle steep,
Renewing rivalries asleep.

feedItems.title: Prominent Russian Nationalist Zakhar Prilepin Wounded in Car Explosion
feedItems.description: Authorities in Moscow blame Ukraine as a third vocal war supporter is targeted since the Russian invasion.

feedItems.title: Russia Evacuates Civilians From Parts of Ukraine Ahead of Kyiv Counteroffensive
feedItems.description: The evacuations are the latest step Russian officials have taken to consolidate their hold on occupied parts of Ukraine ahead of an expected Ukrainian offensive to retake lost territory.

feedItems.title: Prison vs. Harvard: The Debate Rematch
feedItems.description: The Bard Prison Initiative team has built an impressive record—and international reputation—since its unlikely 2015 victory.
